## useMousePosition() function

Gets the current mouse position on the given element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useMousePosition(ref: MutableRefObject<HTMLElement | null>, debouceTime?: number): Position;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | MutableRefObject&lt;HTMLElement \| null&gt; | The ref to the element |
|  debouceTime | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The amount of time to wait between state updates |

<b>Returns:</b>

Position

The current mouse position
